questionTitle: This ticket ________ one person to the museum.
I must tell you about my ________ when I first arrived in London.
It's the ________ in this country for the father of the bride to pay for the wedding.
________ people go to football matches now than twenty years ago.
Jenny and her sister are so ________, they could almost be twins.
In court, she was so upset that she broke ________.
I wish you ________ put your clothes on the floor all the time. It drives me mad.
You asked me to ________ you to post that letter.
It's time we ________ away with our old-fashioned prisons.
Going to the pub too often can easily become a bad ________.
Perhaps some other boys will come ________, too.
He says he's sorry for what he did, so you need not get angry ________ him.
He persisted ________ asking questions.
Mary ________ her hair were straight.
When are you eligible for ________?
I wouldn't have written a letter to him if I ________ he would go away.
I would go and see him if he ________ away.
This is ________ the most difficult job I have ever tackled.
You have to be rich to send a child to a private school because the fees ________.
The murdered man is thought to ________ known the identity of his killer.
